item.title: Woman arrested for allegedly trying to smuggle meth disguised as presents
item.description: A Canadian woman had over 20 pounds of methamphetamine disguised as Christmas presents in her carry-on duffel bag, New Zealand's customs agency said.

item.title: Dec 12: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Trump rings opening bell at New York Stock Exchange; Mysterious drone sightings over New Jersey prompt concerns from residents and lawmakers.

item.title: Mayor Adams meeting with Trump's "border czar" Tom Homan today

item.title: 3 expensive credit card debt forgiveness mistakes to avoid right now
item.description: If you're trying to have your credit card debt forgiven, make sure to avoid these big (but common) missteps.

item.title: AI company says its chatbots will change interactions with teen users
item.description: Character.AI users can create original chatbots or interact with existing bots. Two lawsuits allege those bots harmed teen users.
